1.content: So will Jaune turn into a girl from the show, a female version of himself, or somewhere else?
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
There are multiple ways that Jaune could turn into a girl. There are only a few.

A Strange Object - He could have encountered a strange object that transformed him into a girl. Whether he encountered it on his own, or perhaps someone like Cinder and her team, or even Jaune's own family set him up to find it.

His True Self - Unlocking his aura had a surprising effect on him. During his time in initiation or not long after his body starts to go through some changes.

Cardin's Revenge - After the events of the Emerald Forest, Cardin had done nothing to Jaune and his friends, the leader of Team JNPR thinking that he finally learned his lesson, but in reality, he was biding his time as he waited for the perfect means of getting his revenge on the blonde for messing with him, and making it so that the Arc would do whatever he wanted.

Yang's fellow Partygoer - Yang wants to go out and have some fun out on the town, but sadly none of her friends are up for her kind of fun. She decides that Jaune could be fun to party with, with a few adjustments of course. Whether she decides to change him back or are there some unexpected consequences that remains to be seen.
11.title: Female Version of Himself

12.content: Which team is the girl on?
12.title: A girl from the Show

121.content: So out of his teammates will he turn into Pyrrha or Nora?
121.title: Team JNPR

123.content: Out of the two girls from CVFY, whom is Jaune going to become?
123.title: Team CFVY

13.content: What form of media is the girl from?
13.title: A Crossover Girl

131.content: Does he turn into girl from either of these?
131.title: Anime/Manga

info.brief_description: Jaune gets turned into a woman through a variety of situations.
info.description:
Jaune changes into female characters from the show, original designs, crossovers, and more. Lighter and darker stories alike are welcomed here.

I will give 100 GP for actual chapters where the blonde changes and advances the storyline.
